name: Beyond The Veil (itch) (Hare Software)
description:
Beyond The Veil

Made in 72 hours.

Follow the last moments of a knight’s journey and join him in taking down the Queen, Bishop & Rook of the Marshlands.

Beyond The Veil is a story-rich, turn-based card game with deceptively deep mechanics. Enjoy the fully-voiced characters, detailed environment art and stunning, emotionally charged music.

Credits

Hare Software - Programming, Game Design & Narrative Design
Ben 'Langotriel' French - Casting Direction, Sound Effects & Narrative Design
Igor Ryabykh - Music
Ian Tomlinson - Sound Effects

Voice Actors:
Dianna Conley - Death
Zach Pokres - Knight/Bishop
Aiko Amami - Queen
Franki 'Hankshaw' Garpeman - Rook

Cover art by Oskar 'Swietopelk' Jakubisiak
